EN.LoginErrorMessage: Please check ID and Password then log in.{0}If log in still unsuccessful,please contact the system administrator
EN.CheckMinimumSalesAmount: Total Sales amount does not qualify for tax refund.{0}{0}※ Total sales amount should be a minimum of SGD 100(including GST) on purchases from the same retailer in the same day.
EN.CheckMaximumReceipts: eTRS ticket can be accumulated a maximum of 3 same-day receipts from the same retailer to meet minimum purchase amount.
EN.CheckIssueConditions: There is a receipt that cannot be issued. Please check after printing is finished.{0}{0}※ Total sales amount should be a minimum of SGD 100(including GST) on purchases from the same retailer in the same day.
EN.VoidConfirmation: Would you like to void this e-TRS ticket?
EN.ProceedWithoutDuplicateReceiptNo: Will you proceed to issue e-TRS ticket?
